languages.text: Чтобы одолеть пожар и оказать надлежащий уход пострадавшим первичным системам, каждого техножреца сопровождала паства из спешно сервиторизированных матросов, в чьи головы были помещены Мистерии Адептус Механикус.

traits.locale_text: Прерва бдение на священными машинами, технопровидцы покинули величественные своды инженерного отсека. Пусть их и было слишком мало, чтобы оказать надлежащий уход каждой пострадавшей первичной системе, но каждого техножреца сопровождала паства из спешно сервиторизированных матросов, в чьи головы было помещены Мистерии Адептус Механикус.

languages.text: To suppress the fire and give the damaged primary systems the proper level of care, each Tech-Priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorised crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: Чтобы одолеть пожар и оказать надлежащий уход пострадавшим первичным системам, каждого техножреца сопровождала паства из спешно сервиторизированных матросов, в чьи головы были помещены Мистерии Адептус Механикус.

traits.locale_text: Halting their vigil over the sacred machines, the enginseers left the majestic vaults of the enginarium. Though there were too few of them to give each damaged primary system the proper level of care, each tech-priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorized crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

Halting their vigil over the sacred machines, the enginseers left the majestic vaults of the enginarium. Though there were too few of them to give each damaged primary system the proper level of care, each tech-priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorized crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

Halting their vigil over the sacred machines, the enginseers left the majestic vaults of the enginarium. Though there were too few of them to give each damaged primary system the proper level of care, each tech-priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorized crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

To suppress the fire and give the damaged primary systems the proper level of care, each Tech-Priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorised crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: Cada uno de estos tecnosacerdotes estaba acompañado por varios tripulantes convertidos en servidores, en cuyos cerebros habían sido insertados los misterios del Adeptus Mechanicus, a fin de apagar los incendios y proporcionar los cuidados necesarios a los sistemas principales afectados.
languages.original_text: To suppress the fire and give the damaged primary systems the proper level of care, each Tech-Priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorised crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Deteniendo su vigilia por las sagradas máquinas, los visioingenieros dejaron las majestuosas cámaras del ingeniarium. Aunque eran demasiado pocos para dar el cuidado necesario a los sistemas principales dañados, cada uno de estos tecnosacerdotes estaba acompañado por varios tripulantes convertidos en servidores, en cuyos cerebros habían sido insertados los misterios del Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: 为了制止火势，同时对受损的主要系统进行适当修复，每位技术神甫都在一群机仆的协助之下忙碌起来。那些机仆是不久前由船员改造而成的，他们的大脑被植入了机械修会的奥秘。
languages.original_text: To suppress the fire and give the damaged primary systems the proper level of care, each Tech-Priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorised crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: 引擎先知们停止了对神圣机械的守望，离开了宏伟的引擎区。尽管他们人数太少，没法对每个受损的主系统都进行修复，但每位技术祭司身边都有一群奴工协助。那些奴工是不久前由船员改造而成的，他们的大脑被植入了机械修会的奥秘。

languages.text: Um das Feuer zu unterdrücken und die beschädigten Primärsysteme angemessen zu versorgen, wurde jeder Tech-Priester von einer Schar schnell servitierter Besatzungsmitglieder begleitet, deren Gehirne mit den Geheimnissen des Adeptus Mechanicus aufgeladen worden waren.
languages.original_text: To suppress the fire and give the damaged primary systems the proper level of care, each Tech-Priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorised crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: Pour maîtriser les flammes et donner aux systèmes endommagés le niveau de soins approprié, les technoprêtres étaient accompagnés d'une flopée de membres d'équipage servitorisés à la hâte, leurs cerveaux imprégnés des secrets de l'Adeptus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: To suppress the fire and give the damaged primary systems the proper level of care, each Tech-Priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorised crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Interrompant leur veille sur les machines sacrées, les technaugures ont quitté les voûtes majestueuses de l'enginarium. Et même s'ils étaient trop peu nombreux pour donner à chaque système endommagé le niveau de soins approprié, les technoprêtres étaient accompagnés d'une flopée de membres d'équipage servitorisés à la hâte, leurs cerveaux imprégnés des secrets de l'Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: 炎を鎮火し、被害のあったメインシステムに適切な処置を施すため、技術司祭たちは迅速なサーヴィター化を施されたクルーの集団を伴って動いた。クルー達の脳には、帝国技術局の深秘が詰め込まれていた。
languages.original_text: To suppress the fire and give the damaged primary systems the proper level of care, each Tech-Priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorised crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: 炎を鎮火し、被害のあったメインシステムに適切な処置を施すため、技術司祭たちは迅速なサーヴィター化を施されたクルーの集団を伴って動いた。クルー達の脳には、帝国技術局の深秘が詰め込まれていた。

languages.text: Yangını bastırmak ve hasarlı ana sistemlere gerekli itinayı gösterebilmek için her bir Tekno Rahip'e; alelacele hizmetörleştirilmiş, beyinlerine Adeptus Mechanicus'un Gizemleri yüklenmiş tayfalar eşlik ediyordu.
languages.original_text: To suppress the fire and give the damaged primary systems the proper level of care, each Tech-Priest was accompanied by a flock of rapidly servitorised crew members, whose brains had been loaded with the Mysteries of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Ateşi bastırmak ve hasarlı birincil sistemlere gerekli ilgiyi gösterebilmek için her bir Tekno Rahip; hızla servitörleştirilmiş, beyinlerine Adeptus Mechanicus'un Gizemleri yüklenmiş tayfalarla birlikte hareket etti.
